trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDY103_02921_KELTRAENG_000_000<tab>I say, are you not from Eorzea? And by the looks of it, an adventurer besides?

TEXT_STMBDY103_02921_KELTRAENG_000_001<tab>Marvelous! You see, I have been dispatched here by the Adventurers' Guild to spread recognition of our establishment while helping us gain a foothold here in the Far East.

TEXT_STMBDY103_02921_KELTRAENG_000_002<tab>And what better way to the locals' hearts than by offering them our aid─through guildleves, of course. We already have plenty of work for those with the skills, and I hope we can depend upon yours as well.
TEXT_STMBDY103_02921_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>You now have access to guildleves in Kugane. Speak with Keltraeng to undertake tasks for Disciples of the Hand and Disciples of the Land.
TEXT_STMBDY103_02921_KELTRAENG_000_010<tab>I hope I can find skilled adventurers here, and enough of them to meet demand...
TEXT_STMBDY103_02921_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 60 or above.
